#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<vector>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>	 
long long int countFact(long long int n,long long int p)
	{
	    long long int k=0;
	    while (n>0)
	    {
	        k+=n/p;
	        n/=p;
	    }
	    return k;
	}
long long int pow(long long int a,long long int b,long long int MOD)
	{
         long long int x=1,y=a;
	    while(b > 0)
	    {
	        if((b&1) == 1)
        {
	            x=(x*y);
	            if(x>MOD) x%=MOD;
        }
	        y = (y*y);
	        if(y>MOD) y%=MOD;
	        b /= 2;
	    }
	    return x;
	}
     long long int C(long long int n,long long int r,long long int MOD)
	{
	    long long int res = 1;
	    vector<bool> isPrime(n,1);
	    for (long long int i=2; i<=n; i++)
	        if (isPrime[i])
	        {
	            for (long long int j=2*i; j<=n; j+=i)
	                isPrime[j]=0;
	            long long int k = countFact(n,i) - countFact(r,i) - countFact(n-r,i); 
	            res = (res * pow(i, k, MOD)) % MOD;
	        }
	    return res;
	}
int main()
{
          int t,m,n;
          unsigned long long int k;
          scanf("%d",&t);
          while(t--)
          {
          scanf("%d%d%llu",&m,&n,&k);
          printf("%llu\n",C(m+n,m,k));
          }
return 0;
}
